item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Rewrite the shops and stop copy pasting the junk code you have and your life will be 1000% easier.
Also, if it says “You don’t have enough coins” it doesn’t sound like you’re handling the shop correctly…

else if(c.myShopId != 91) {

Maybe make that^^^

this:

else if(c.myShopId == 91) {

item.title: Monkey Nuts
item.dc:creator: @Doing_Cho21 Doing Cho2
item.description:
@Doing_Cho21 wrote:

Can you tell me whats wrong with this code. The shops says “item currently costs 5 monkey nuts” But it wont sell and when i try to buy it says "you dont have enough coins"
Any Ideas?

else if(c.myShopId != 91) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.getItems().deleteItem(4012, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4012), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough MONKEY NUTS!"); break; } }
if(Slot4 == -1 && c.myShopId == 91) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough MONKEY NUTS!"); break;
Slot4 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(4012);
